channel.title: Firebay Electro Plumbing
channel.description: Recent content on Firebay Electro Plumbing

item.title: Long time no blogging...
item.description:
Welcome to Firebay Electro Plumbing -blog.

It has been around 11 years since my last real blogging attempt and while I find Facebook to be nice platform for ad hoc -stories, I find the short lifetime of stories in feed and the search functionality quite lacking.

item.title: Commodore 1541-II disk drive repair with a twist
item.description: Another repair story, this time disk drive - Commodore 1541-II, with a bit of an unexpected end result.

item.title: Extreme C64 refurbishing
item.description: This is a story of extreme refurbishing of Commodore 64 machine I call “The Rusty British Lady”.

item.title: 12kbps data transfer for AVR using audio
